description: This file defines a Flutter widget for editing notes, including UI components for title, content, color selection, and saving functionality. It interacts with a NotesProvider for data persistence and utilizes a Note model.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that provides UI for creating or editing a note.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

classes.name: _NoteEditorScreenState
classes.description: The internal state class managing the editing logic and UI of NoteEditorScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes controllers and selected color based on existing note data.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of controllers when widget is removed.

methods.name: _saveNote
methods.description: Constructs a Note object from user input and saves it via provider, poping the navigation stack afterward.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for note editing, including text fields, color selection, and save button.

methods.name: _saveNote
methods.description: Saves the current note (creates a new one or updates existing) via provider and closes the editor.
